reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805: MOTORIZED SNOW VEHICLE OPERATORS' LICENCES
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805: MOTORIZED SNOW VEHICLE OPERATORS' LICENCES
reg_info.act_under: Motorized Snow Vehicles Act   Loi sur les motoneiges

content.content: 1. An applicant for a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence shall produce evidence satisfactory to the Minister that the applicant has, (a) attended a course of instruction in the safe operation of motorized snow vehicles recognized by the Minister; and (b) passed a test of knowledge and competence approved by the Minister.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. An applicant for a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence shall produce evidence satisfactory to the Minister that the applicant has,

(a) attended a course of instruction in the safe operation of motorized snow vehicles recognized by the Minister; and

(b) passed a test of knowledge and competence approved by the Minister.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence shall expire upon the issuance of a driver’s licence to the holder of the motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence shall expire upon the issuance of a driver’s licence to the holder of the motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 2.

content.content: 3. No person having a valid or suspended driver’s licence shall apply for, secure or retain in his or her possession, a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. No person having a valid or suspended driver’s licence shall apply for, secure or retain in his or her possession, a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 805, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The fee is $7 for a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence and for a duplicate if the original is lost or destroyed.  O. Reg. 527/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 4. The fee is $7 for a motorized snow vehicle operator’s licence and for a duplicate if the original is lost or destroyed.  O. Reg. 527/91, s. 1.
